trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" /> class is used to pass flags to the server to control search behavior.
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" />-Klasse wird verwendet, um Flags an den Server zu 체bergeben und so das Suchverhalten zu steuern.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" /> class.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" /> enumeration value that specifies the search behavior.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" /> class using the specified search options.
trans-unit.target: Der <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption)" />-Konstruktor erstellt mithilfe der angegebenen Suchoptionen eine Instanz der <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl" />-Klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.GetValue" /> method returns search option for this object.
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.GetValue" />-Methode gibt die Suchoption f체r dieses Objekt zur체ck.

trans-unit.source: The search option associated with this control.

The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.SearchOption" /> property contains one of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" /> enumeration that specifies the search behavior.
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.SearchOption" />-Eigenschaft enth채lt einen der Werte der <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" />-Enumeration, der das Suchverhalten festlegt.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" /> enumeration that specifies the search behavior.
trans-unit.target: Einer der Werte der <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" />-Enumeration, der das Suchverhalten festlegt.

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption" />.
